relationships.evidence: Eddard Stark had married her in Brandon's place, as custom decreed

relationships.description: Eddard is the father of Robb.
relationships.evidence: Robb, the heir to Winterfell, fourteen years of age

relationships.description: Eddard is the father of Jon Snow.
relationships.evidence: Lord Eddard Stark is my father

relationships.description: Cersei is the mother of Joffrey.
relationships.evidence: Queen Cersei, of House Lannister ... PRINCE JOFFREY, heir to the Iron Throne
Ser Jaime Lannister was twin to Queen Cersei

relationships.description: Tyrion is the brother of Cersei.
Daenerys is married to Khal Drogo.
Jon Snow joins the Night's Watch.
relationships.evidence: I want to serve in the Night's Watch, Uncle.

relationships.description: Ned Stark uses the greatsword Ice.
relationships.evidence: He took hold of Ice with both hands

relationships.description: Arya wields the sword Needle given to her by Jon.
relationships.evidence: Arya lifted it out almost tenderly and drew the slender blade from its sheath. Needle.

relationships.description: Jeor Mormont gives Jon the Valyrian steel sword Longclaw.
relationships.evidence: The Old Bear gave it to me... Longclaw, it was called.

relationships.description: Jon Snow is bonded with the direwolf Ghost.
relationships.evidence: Jon and his wolf were nowhere to be found

relationships.description: Daenerys is the Mother of Dragons.
relationships.evidence: Drogon, Viserion, Rhaegal... Mother of Dragons

relationships.description: Ser Ilyn Payne executes Eddard Stark.
relationships.evidence: Ser Ilyn drew a two-handed greatsword... Arya heard her sister scream.
I am the Prince of Winterfell! This is my seat

relationships.description: Melisandre's shadow assassin kills Renly Baratheon.
relationships.evidence: The shadow... the steel of his gorget parted like cheesecloth... Renly was dead

relationships.description: Tyrion leads the defense of King's Landing during the Battle of the Blackwater.
relationships.evidence: Tyrion drove into the gap hard on the king's hooves... 'Halfman! Halfman!'

relationships.description: Davos is a loyal knight to Stannis.
relationships.evidence: I am yours to command, my king. As ever.

schema_proposals.name: sibling_of
schema_proposals.description: Indicates a sibling relationship between two characters.

schema_proposals.name: betrothed_to
schema_proposals.description: Indicates a formal engagement to marry.

schema_proposals.name: captured
schema_proposals.description: Indicates one entity capturing or holding another prisoner (person or location).
